data.text: @breeadail @JoeBiden @BorderReportcom 15.6 billion for covid. We have 800billion for covid not spent. THIS is a money giveaway to Dem pet projects. DO NOT PASS THIS BILL, SENATE. It is just a repackaged BBB bill, with a new name. Aid to Ukraine so they can say see, the GOP hates Ukraine. Fund Ukraine with a sep bill
@breeadail @JoeBiden @BorderReportcom Does the 13.6 B for Ukraine mention air defense? Where Poland get their Migs?
@breeadail @JoeBiden @BorderReportcom Where is the roll call vote in this?
@breeadail @JoeBiden @BorderReportcom How much is needed and how much is pork ? Why do I think at least 40% ?
